name: electrify
effect: Changes the target’s move’s type to electric if it hasn’t moved yet this turn.
short_effect: Changes the target’s move’s type to electric if it hasn’t moved yet this turn.

flavor_text.sun-moon: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes Electric type.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes Electric type.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes Electric type.
